version_description:
- New features for business "WebStorage for Business" users
- Bug fix

Crash fixes and performance improvements
Improved stability and security

Add ASUS HomeCloud feature, provides the public cloud and private cloud storage in one APP.
Give you a better Camera Uploads user experience.

​​1. The improvement on viewing photos and videos:
● Better browsing experience.
● Fix the drag problem on timeline bar during video playing.
● When browsing photos, you can delete the photo you are viewing
2. Improve the performance at displaying thumbnails and images.
3. Add the Facebook Club; join us to get the latest updates.

1. New User Interface, better using experience.
2. Fixes some crash issues.
● Fixes some crash issues.
● Performance improvements and bug fixes.

1. Support iOS 10
2. Performance improvements and bug fixes.
Performance improvements and bug fixes.

1. Cancel automatic logout.
2. Bug Fixes.

1. Optimized for iOS 11
2. HEIC photos can be previewed in WebStorage! (To make it more compatible with different devices, WebStorage will convert HEIC to JPG while uploading.)


***
Tip: All “Starred” files will be downloaded to your device for offline viewing. If you don’t need them stored in your device, you can press [i] and “Remove Star” on those files in “Starred” page to free up device storage.

Fix video uploading issue.

***
Tip: All “Starred” files will be downloaded to your device for offline viewing. If you don’t need them stored in your device, you can press [i] and “Remove Star” on those files in “Starred” page to free up device storage.

1. Fix photo and video uploading issue.
2. Access permission now remains consistent in different pages.
3. Performance improvements.

***
Tip: All “Starred” files will be downloaded to your device for offline viewing. If you don’t need them stored in your device, you can press [i] and “Remove Star” on those files in “Starred” page to free up device storage.

1. iPhone X compatibility
2. UI Improvements

***
Tip: All “Starred” files will be downloaded to your device for offline viewing. If you don’t need them stored in your device, you can press [i] and “Remove Star” on those files in “Starred” page to free up device storage.
Some bugs fixed: log-in issue with short ID .

1. Increases automatic backup performance of photos and videos significantly.
2. Videos added through the automatic upload function will be backed up.
3. All new UI interface.
